text: Trite simoni is a jumping spider species in the genus Trite. It was first identified in 2014 by Polish arachnologist Barbara Maria Patoleta. ==Description== The species has a brown cephalothorax long and an abdomen long with a whitish-greyish pattern. ==Distribution== Trite simoni is found on the Loyalty Islands, New Caledonia. ==References== Category:Fauna of New Caledonia Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders described in 2014 Category:Spiders of Oceania
title: Trite simoni
